description: Unique identifier for a form/UI control that captures or displays an asset-related field in the fleet system. Used to configure, reference, and audit that specific control across screens and workflows.
Identifier linking a control to its display label, typically referencing localized label text. Likely a foreign key to a label/translation resource; confirm with SME.

Stable string key used as the HTML/DOM id or API identifier for the fieldâ€™s label/control, representing asset acquisition and attachment properties. Supports binding, automation, and integration across UI and services.
